function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Subjectivity in literature selection in critical literature review (CLR)","Impact":"Potential bias in the review process leading to incomplete or skewed analysis","Mitigation":"Integration of diverse perspectives and independent review by multiple researchers","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, authors, reviewers","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Inability of systematic literature review (SLR) to synthesize academic and grey literature not indexed in popular search engines","Impact":"Limited representation of diverse literature sources in the review","Mitigation":"Exploration of alternative literature databases and inclusion of non-indexed sources","Technologies":"Literature search tools, database integration tools","People":"Researchers, authors, reviewers","Owner":"Researchers, academic institutions"}]}
